prompt: Top-down isometric pixel art scene of a futuristic AI command center at night. Dark void background (#0a0a0f). 8 distinct pixel art characters (16-32px style) at glowing workstations arranged in a hub layout around a central holographic display. Neon cyan (#00f0ff) monitor glow, magenta (#ff00aa) accent lights, electric purple (#9b59ff) ambient. Each workstation has a unique setup - one has multiple screens (executive), one has stacks of data (researcher), one has code terminals (developer), one has a writing desk (content), one has color swatches (brand), one has social feeds (social media), one has a project board (PM), one has testing equipment (QA). Style: clean pixel art, Hyper Light Drifter meets corporate office. No text anywhere.
